item.title: A bit about myself
item.description: I am a Masters student in Statistics with a 2.5 year work experience in the data science field. I have professional and academic experience in various stacks of Data Science - Data Storage and Pre-processing, Exploratory Analysis and Visualization, Model building, evaluation and deployment. Currently my research focus is on NLP, Graph databases & network analysis and Deep Learning. Platforms I have worked with: R, Python, C++, Hive, Hadoop, mySQL, Pig, SAS, Excel (VBA) and Tableau
